overview:
David Godden is Managing Director & Co-Founder at Keynet Marketing Ltd based in London, UK.

Keynet Marketing establish US-based high end sales & marketing SaaS companies in the UK/EU by creating a virtual subsidiary that market, sell and support their client’s solutions. Keynet have assisted companies such as Pardot, DocuSign and Baynote with their international growth.

Before setting up Keynet, Godden was a founding partner with London-based consultancy Keymail Marketing, established in early 2005. Keymail Marketing was wholly acquired by ExactTarget, Inc in 2009 as the launch pad for their international growth.

Prior to this Godden was Client Services Director at Bluestreak (formerly e2Communications) for over 5 years. Responsibilities included management of all major email accounts along with pre- and post-sales consultancy and project management of larger solutions projects.

Having been part of the birth of email marketing in the UK, Godden has a wealth of experience in the medium and helped some of the country’s biggest brands generate and maintain successful online marketing campaigns.

Prior to working at Bluestreak, Godden was Project Manager at Navedian, a highly successful multimedia and internet design & build consultancy for 3 years.

Godden’s former work includes many project management roles in IT and other sectors.

milestones.description: Keymail Marketing Ltd, wholly acquired by ExactTarget, Inc in 2009.
milestones.source_description: ExactTarget Launches International Division in London Following Acquisition of Keymail Marketing
